name: Lisa's Best Ever Garlic Bread
author: momof3ccc
summary: Your family, friends, and neighbors will be hooked! Place bread in a large serving bowl and watch it disappear. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) loaf French bread, halved lengthwise
directions: Melt butter in a small saucepan; simmer garlic slices in hot butter over low heat until butter turns foamy, about 5 minutes
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Place bread loaf halves under the preheated broiler to toast, 2 to 4 minutes
Slice toasted bread into 2-inch thick slices
Dip toasted side of each slice into garlic butter
